alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Carson; Potter (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 2:08AM CDT until July 01 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Armstrong County in the Panhandle of Texas... Carson County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Potter County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 315 AM CDT. * At 208 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northwest of Washburn, or 13 miles northeast of Amarillo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. * Locations impacted include... Amarillo, Panhandle, White Deer, Groom and Pantex. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
